query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `client_organizations` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(300) NOT NULL,
  `nameFr` varchar(300),
  `orgType` enum('federal_department','provincial_ministry','crown_corporation','agency','other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'federal_department',
  `sector` varchar(200),
  `contactName` varchar(200),
  `contactEmail` varchar(320),
  `contactPhone` varchar(50),
  `address` text,
  `city` varchar(100),
  `province` varchar(100),
  `postalCode` varchar(10),
  `contractStartDate` varchar(10),
  `contractEndDate` varchar(10),
  `status` enum('active','pending','suspended','expired') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `maxParticipants` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 50,
  `logoUrl` text,
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `organization_managers` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `role` enum('primary_contact','training_manager','observer') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'training_manager',
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `participants` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `firstName` varchar(128) NOT NULL,
  `lastName` varchar(128) NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(320) NOT NULL,
  `employeeId` varchar(64),
  `department` varchar(200),
  `position` varchar(200),
  `currentLevel` enum('A1','A2','B1','B2','C1') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A1',
  `targetLevel` enum('A1','A2','B1','B2','C1') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'B2',
  `program` enum('FSL','ESL') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'FSL',
  `status` enum('active','on_hold','completed','withdrawn') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `enrolledAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `completedAt` timestamp,
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `training_cohorts` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL,
  `nameFr` varchar(256),
  `program` enum('FSL','ESL') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'FSL',
  `cefrLevel` enum('A1','A2','B1','B2','C1') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'B1',
  `coachId` int,
  `startDate` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
  `endDate` varchar(10),
  `schedule` varchar(256),
  `maxParticipants` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 15,
  `currentParticipants` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `status` enum('planned','active','completed','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'planned',
  `description` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cohort_participants` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `cohortId` int NOT NULL,
  `participantId` int NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('enrolled','active','completed','withdrawn') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'enrolled',
  `enrolledAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `completedAt` timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `billing_records` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `invoiceNumber` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `description` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `descriptionFr` varchar(500),
  `amount` int NOT NULL,
  `currency` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'CAD',
  `billingType` enum('training_package','coaching_session','assessment','material','custom') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'training_package',
  `status` enum('draft','sent','paid','overdue','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  `issuedDate` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
  `dueDate` varchar(10),
  `paidDate` varchar(10),
  `cohortId` int,
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `budget_allocations` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `fiscalYear` varchar(9) NOT NULL,
  `totalBudget` int NOT NULL,
  `allocatedAmount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `spentAmount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `category` enum('training','coaching','assessment','materials','other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'training',
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `compliance_records` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `participantId` int NOT NULL,
  `assessmentType` enum('sle_reading','sle_writing','sle_oral','internal_assessment','placement_test') NOT NULL,
  `currentResult` varchar(10),
  `targetResult` varchar(10),
  `assessmentDate` varchar(10),
  `nextAssessmentDate` varchar(10),
  `status` enum('pending','in_progress','achieved','not_achieved','expired') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `coaching_sessions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `participantId` int,
  `userId` int,
  `coachId` int,
  `organizationId` int,
  `cohortId` int,
  `calendlyEventUri` varchar(512),
  `calendlyInviteeUri` varchar(512),
  `sessionType` enum('individual','group','assessment','consultation') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'individual',
  `title` varchar(256) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `scheduledAt` timestamp,
  `durationMinutes` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 60,
  `status` enum('scheduled','confirmed','in_progress','completed','cancelled','no_show') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'scheduled',
  `meetingUrl` text,
  `coachNotes` text,
  `participantFeedback` text,
  `rating` int,
  `cancelledAt` timestamp,
  `cancelReason` text,
  `completedAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
